message.content:
cs.AI, cs.DB, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.CY. 

The paper presents an approach to integrate EHRs from heterogeneous resources and generate integrated data in different data formats or semantics to support various clinical research applications. This involves semantic processing and integration of clinical data from different sources, which is a common problem in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and database (cs.DB) research. The approach also involves automated data extraction and conversion, which can be considered as a problem in machine learning (cs.LG) and information retrieval (cs.IR). The use of semantic web technologies and ontologies also suggests a possible sub-category of cybernetics (cs.CY). Finally, the paper discusses the application of the proposed approach to real-world clinical research, which could be relevant to the sub-category of social and information sciences (cs.SI).
